tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
  feedback_id INT NOT NULL,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating FLOAT,
  date_received DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customer (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  last_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE FeedbackHistory (
  feedback_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  rating_id INT,
  feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES CustomerFeedback (feedback_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES FeedbackCategories (category_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (rating_id) REFERENCES FeedbackRatings (rating_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE customer (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    contact_number TEXT,
    email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE service (
    service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name TEXT,
    service_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE feedback_category (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE feedback_rating (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_id INT,
    rating_value INT
)
